Monitory letter about the maintenance of an able and faithful ministry directed unto those people who sin against & sin away the Gospel by not supporting the worthy preachers of the Gospel. Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.
16 p.
[s.n.], Boston in N.E. printed : 1700.
Attributed to Mather by Wing. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
